original_text: When therefore I have performed this, and have sealed to them this fruit, I will come by you into Spain.
korean_text: 그러므로 내가 이 일을 마치고 이 열매를 그들에게 확증한 후에 너희에게 들렀다가 서바나로 가리라

sentences.original_text: When therefore I have performed this
and have sealed to them this fruit
I will come by you into Spain
